Package org.nineml.coffeefilter.exceptions

Class IxmlException

java.lang.Object
java.lang.Throwable
java.lang.Exception
java.lang.RuntimeException
org.nineml.coffeefilter.exceptions.IxmlException
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
IxmlTreeException
public class IxmlException extends RuntimeException
An Ixml exception.

IxmlException is just a wrapper around a RuntimeException. It's provided as a convenience for catching errors raised by the Ixml parser.

See Also:
